ability.description: The namespace and ID of the ability to check for.
ability.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the ability to check for.

type.description:
## Ability

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/ability)

Checks if the player has the specified ability enabled.

Type ID: `origins:ability`

---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:ability",
    "ability": "minecraft:mayfly"
}
```

This example will check if the player can fly in a Creative Mode-like fashion.

title: Ability (Entity Condition Type) date: 2021-12-07

Ability

Entity Condition Type

Checks if the player has the specified ability enabled.

Type ID: origins:ability

Fields

Field Type Default Description
ability Player Ability The namespace and ID of the ability to check for.

Examples

"condition": {
    "type": "origins:ability",
    "ability": "minecraft:mayfly"
}

This example will check if the player can fly in a Creative Mode-like fashion.
